question:
Consider the following statements about Pragati scholarship scheme:
  1. It is an initiative by the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
  2. It involves the voluntary contribution of corporates in the form of a scholarship to improve the educational status of SC/ST/OBCs in the society
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. The Pragati scholarship scheme is an initiative by the HRD ministry being implemented by the AICTE. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u>. It aims at providing scholarship for girls in AICTE approved Institutions for technical education. The amount of scholarship available under the scheme is the Tuition Fee of Rs. 30000/- or at actual, whichever is less and Rs. 2000/- per month for 10 months as incidentals each year. The total number of scholarships give per annum under the scheme is 4000. The candidates are selected on merit of the qualifying examination. Only one girl per family whose annual income is less than Rs 6 Lakhs and two girls per family, if the family annual income is less than 8lakh are eligible for the scholarship.
